outputs.output_descr: The principal objective of the renewable energy programme is to enable the majority of Malawi population to have access to efficient, sustainable and affordable energy for their socio economic development. The program will contribute towards this objective by )1 Creating and enabling environment for the promotion of renewable energy services- focusing on formulation and promotion of  appropriate policies and incentives structures, 2) building capacities for implementation of the  National Sustainable and Renewable Energy Programmes; 3) promoting delivery of energy services in rural areas and 4) facilitating establishment of a renewable energy financing scheme.
